lead_paragraph: Readers praise Mrs. Clinton’s speech, berate Republicans who won’t attend the convention and chide Paul Ryan for choosing winning over principles.

headline.main: Battle Lines: As Clinton Vilifies Trump, Ryan Endorses Him
headline.print_headline: The Battle Lines Over Donald Trump

snippet: Readers praise Mrs. Clinton’s speech, berate Republicans who won’t attend the convention and chide Paul Ryan for choosing winning over principles.
